name: 2-1-1 Information and Referral
short_desc: 211 is the national, toll-free, three-digit phone number to call 24 hours a day for information about local health and human services
description: 24 Hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year from anywhere in Fresno County. Quickly connect  to helpful resources in the Central Valley community. 2-1-1 is free and confidential.
